name: Beach Head 2002
overview:
A virtual reality military combat game released on the Global VR Vortek system.

Beach Head 2002 puts players in the position of a lone soldier, charged with defending a vital inland command post against an imminent airborne assault. With the beach invasion repulsed, players are sent to the rear. The enemy is determined to launch an all-out airborne assault in the rear. Paratroopers, infantry, tanks, armored cars, helicopters and gun-ships converge onto the battlefield. Adding to the madness is the re-introduction of the player's former drill sergeant, whose exclusive assignment is to 'inspire' and 'motivate' players.
